Keywords: Avengers , Howling Commandos , Invaders , Past , S.H.I.E.L.D. , Soldier
Real Name: Bucky Barnes
Team Up
1
TEAM UP: CAPTAIN AMERICA: If Bucky and the listed friendly character are on the map, they both can use Perplex.
Special Powers
I KNOW YOUR ATTACK IS COMING: Super Senses. When Bucky uses it and succeeds, after resolutions remove an action token from him.

Comments
December 7, 2022
machineman
I think I missed an important story-arc from this character’s past. Maybe there’ll be some Sentry-like mind swipe retcon story in the coming years? Lol, well the greatest Bucky, nay— the greatest Side-kick character to have ever been clixed! But if you’ve ever hesitated to resurrect this classic comic team-up because Cap had to pull the entire weight of the team, here’s your boy! I’d say he’s well worth his points. He’s got the right defense with the right attacks, can self-remove tokens, support his team, geez. I like him. I just don’t know who he is!
November 14, 2022
CaptainAmerica1945
To me this dial at point lines is more suitable to Winter Soldier then Bucky; invulnerability is a glaring change from most Bucky's that have come before. In retrospect I suspect that Bucky was mixed up with Winter Soldier but I digress. The team ups are a bit hit and miss for me; not sure how well giving perplex to both Cap and Bucky will work out but I'll definitely have to try out. The traited super senses is a big deal as well which gives him a chance not to get crushed on the lower dial. Overall I think this is an interesting representation of Bucky; time will tell if he is effective however...
November 10, 2022
OutlawFH
This fig absolutely BUCKS!
November 8, 2022
Novashotgunner
Just here to echo all prior sentiments. The invuln, senses and combat prowess this figure has is way more akin to a Winter Soldier than a WWII Bucky Barnes. Especially when a Captain America in the same set only gets Toughness a kid with no shield, armor or dare i say it.... Metal arm really shouldn't have invuln. That being said he is exactly what you want for an uncommon in sealed. Running shot pen/psy, outwit and great defense make him easily pull his weight. Theres not a ton of protected outwit in this set so he really shines!
November 8, 2022

Yeah, this Bucky confuses me. I mean... is it supposed to represent Bucky in an Iron Man suit?
